briefdescription.para: Maximum number of alternate modes supported by the Billboard module.
Initialization value for mode status register.
Alternate Mode status mask for each mode.

detaileddescription.para: One second is used to ensure that, timer module goes through only one interrupt per request.

briefdescription.para: Timeout special value for not disabling the Billboard interface.
Minimum timeout value in allowed in seconds = 60 s.
Maximum buffering for EP0 transactions inside the Billboard module.

detaileddescription.para: This definition is valid only for internal Billboard implementation

briefdescription.para: Additional failure information due to lack of power as per the Billboard capability descriptor.
Additional failure information due to USBPD communication failure as per billboard capability descriptor.
Disconnect BB Status for BB connect event.
Connect BB Status for BB connect event.
Maximum number of Alternate Modes supported.
Bit field in bb_option from configuration table which indicates that the device needs to enable Vendor interface along with Billboard.
Bit field in bb_option from configuration table which indicates that the device needs to enable Vendor interface along with Billboard.
Bit field in bb_option from configuration table which indicates that the device needs to enable HID interface along with Billboard.
Number of Alternate Mode field offset in the BOS descriptor.
Offset for Alternate Mode status field offset in the BOS descriptor.
Offset for Alternate Mode bAdditionalFailureInfo field in the BOS descriptor.
Offset for Alternate Mode 0 information offset in the BOS descriptor.
Size of each Alternate Mode information in bytes.
Offset of dwAlternateModeVdo in AUM Capability descriptor.
Status code indicating Billboard is busy.

detaileddescription.para: Enumeration for the Billboard status codes
Enumeration lists all the supported causes for Billboard enumeration

briefdescription.para: Undefined error or Alternate Mode does not exist.
Alternate Mode entry attempted but failed.

detaileddescription.para: Enumeration lists the different status values as defined by the billboard class specification.
Enumeration lists the different string indices used in the Billboard implementation.

briefdescription.para: The function queues a Billboard enumeration or re-enumeration.

detaileddescription.para: The API queues the Billboard enumeration as per the configuration information provided. Enumeration details are retrieved from the configuration table.
The function can be called multiple times applications to trigger a re-enumeration without explicit disable call.

For internal implementation of Billboard, the USB module is controlled from the Cy_App_Usb_BbTask() and this function only queues the request. It should be noted that only one pending request is honored. If more than one request is queued, only the latest is handled. This request is failed if the flashing mode is in progress.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Alt Mode context

detaileddescription.para: The function updates the Alternate Mode status information for the specified Alternate Mode index. The Alternate Mode index should match the DISCOVER_SVID and DISCOVER_MODES response for the device.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Alt Mode context
Index of the mode as defined by the Alternate Mode manager

briefdescription.para: Checks whether a Billboard interface is present.

detaileddescription.para: The function checks the configuration information and identifies if a Billboard device exists.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Alt Mode context

simplesect.para: Returns true if Billboard is present and false if absent

detaileddescription.para: The API disables the Billboard Device and disconnects the terminations. For internal implementation of Billboard, the USB module is controlled from the Cy_App_Usb_BbTask() and this function only queues the request. It should be noted that only one pending request is honored. If more than one request is queued, only the latest is handled. A disable call clears any pending enable.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Alt Mode context
Whether to force a disable; false = Interface not disabled when in flashing mode, true = Interface disabled regardless of the operation mode.

briefdescription.para: Updates the Alternate Mode status for all modes.

detaileddescription.para: The current Billboard implementation supports a maximum of eight Alternate Modes, and each mode as defined in the order of BOS descriptor has two bit status. Bit 1:0 indicates status of Alt Mode 0 and Bit 3:2 indicates status of Alt Mode 1, and so on. This function should be only used when the Billboard status needs to be reinitialized to a specific value. In individual entry/exit cases, Cy_PdAltMode_Billboard_AltStatusUpdate() should be used.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Alt Mode context
Status data for all Alternate Modes

detaileddescription.para: 1.0 This header file defines the data structures and function prototypes associated with the USB Billboard.
